attributes.action: The 17,410,742 who voted to Leave, voted for a complete & utter "Hard Brexit".
attributes.background: All those who voted for Leave, voted to remove any and all control that the EU has over this country. No control over our trade, our laws, our fisheries, our money, our borders or any other control. The British people, who are the sovereign power, have made their choice. You must deliver it.
